channel.title: CVE Feed for H5P CSS Editor -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for H5P CSS Editor -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-39318|2024-08-04T02:06:41.585Z -- h5p%20css%20editor -- h5p%20css%20editor
item.description: The H5P CSS Editor WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the h5p-css-file parameter found in the ~/h5p-css-editor.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.0.
